SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, t.task_stage, t.creator AS creatorId, t.creation_time, t.project_id, t.simulation_stage, t.type, t.status, u.username AS creator FROM mod_tasks t LEFT JOIN mod_users u ON t.creator = u.user_id LEFT JOIN mod_projects p ON t.project_id = p.project_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND p.project_status = 0
AND ( t.task_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY t.creation_time DESC
